fields.name: AllowConfigFileUpdates
fields.description: false if config file is locked for this static web app; otherwise, true.

fields.name: Branch
fields.description: The target branch in the repository.

fields.name: BuildProperties
fields.description: Build properties to configure on the repository.

fields.name: ContentDistributionEndpoint
fields.description: The content distribution endpoint for the static site.

fields.name: CustomDomains
fields.description: The custom domains associated with this static site.

fields.name: DatabaseConnections
fields.description: Database connections for the static site

fields.name: DefaultHostname
fields.description: The default autogenerated hostname for the static site.

fields.name: EnterpriseGradeCdnStatus
fields.description: State indicating the status of the enterprise grade CDN serving traffic to the static web app.

fields.name: KeyVaultReferenceIdentity
fields.description: Identity to use for Key Vault Reference authentication.

fields.name: LinkedBackends
fields.description: Backends linked to the static side

fields.name: Provider
fields.description: The provider that submitted the last deployment to the primary environment of the static site.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: State indicating whether public traffic are allowed or not for a static web app. Allowed Values: 'Enabled', 'Disabled' or an empty string.

fields.name: RepositoryToken
fields.description: A user's github repository token. This is used to setup the Github Actions workflow file and API secrets.

fields.name: RepositoryUrl
fields.description: URL for the repository of the static site.

fields.name: StagingEnvironmentPolicy
fields.description: State indicating whether staging environments are allowed or not allowed for a static web app.

fields.name: TemplateProperties
fields.description: Template options for generating a new repository.

fields.name: UserProvidedFunctionApps
fields.description: User provided function apps registered with the static site
